supportModal.supportText: Най-бързият начин да се свържете с човек за поддръжка е да се присъедините към нашия сървър в Дискорд!
supportModal.bugRepText: Please take the time to write an issue and let us make Stereum better!
supportModal.docsText: A handy link to the network logs' documentation for your selected node configuration.

notifModal.notifText: Можете да настроите различни източници на известия и статуса/състоянието, за който/което искате да бъдете уведомявани

taskManager.clickDisplay: Кликнете върху задачите, за да ги покажете

displayValidator.waitForImport: Моля изчакайте, докато ключ(овете) бъдат импортирани
displayValidator.warningMessage: Our additional Slashing Protection Checks showed that one of the validators you are about to import has attested in the last 2 epochs.
displayValidator.warningAlarm: WARNING: You run a high risk of getting slashed!
displayValidator.warningQuestion: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO IMPORT THE VALIDATOR KEYS?

exitMultipleValidator.passMessage: ВЪВЕДЕТЕ ПАРОЛАТА СИ ЗА ВАЛИДИРАНЕ, ЗА ДА ИЗЛЕЗЕТЕ ОТ ВЕРИГАТА С ТОЗИ КЛЮЧ...

exitValidatorModal.modalMessage: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да излезете от веригата с ИЗБРАНИТЕ КЛЮЧОВЕ ЗА УТВЪРЖДАВАНЕ? Това прекратява работата на валидатора и НЕ МОЖЕ да бъде върнато назад. Вашите средства също могат да се изтеглят само ако веригата го позволява.
exitValidatorModal.exitApprove: ПРОЧЕТОХ ТЕКСТА И СЪМ НАЯСНО С ПОСЛЕДСТВИЯТА
exitValidatorModal.clickClose: Клинкете извън прозореца за да затворите/прекратите.

feeRecipient.textPlaceHolder: Въведете валиден адрес в Етериум, за да изпратите блок наградите си на...

grafitiMultipleValidator.textPlaceHolder: Enter up to 32 characters to add to the chain when you create a block!

renameValidator.textPlaceHolder: Enter up to 32 characters to rename the validator!

insertValidator.insertText: КЛИКНЕТЕ ИЛИ ПЛЪЗНЕТЕ, ЗА ДА ДОБАВИТЕ КЛЮЧ

removeSingleModal.question: DO YOU WANT TO DOWNLOAD YOUR SLASHING DATABASE?
removeSingleModal.description: You can IMPORT THIS WITH YOUR VALIDATOR KEYS TO ENSURE YOU ADDITIONAL SAFETY WHEN MIGRATING YOUR KEYS

removeMultiModal.sure: Are you sure you want to remove this key from your machine?
removeMultiModal.path: choose a path to save exported slashing db

removeMultipleValidators.sureText: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да премахнете всички ключове на Validator ОТ ТАЗИ МАШИНА?

installOption.installText: CHOOSE YOUR USE CASE AND NETWORK. AFTER CHOOSING AND PRESSING START A RANDOM CLIENT SELECTION WILL BE TAKEN TO SERVE YOUR USE CASE

installitionMenu.installText: В ТАЗИ СТЪПКА ИЗБИРАТЕ НАЧИНА НА ИНСТАЛИРАНЕ НА НОД-а. АКО ИМАТЕ НУЖДА ОТ ПОМОЩ ПРИ ИНСТАЛИРАНЕТО, ПРИСЪЕДИНЕТЕ СЕ КЪМ НАШИЯ ДИСКОРД - С УДОВОЛСТВИЕ ЩЕ ВИ ПОМОГНЕМ
installitionMenu.osCheck: ПРОВЕРКА ДАЛИ ОПЕРАЦИОННАТА СИСТЕМА НА ВАШИЯ СЪРВЪР СЕ ПОДДЪРЖА

pluginName.syncClient: СИНХРОНИЗИРА ВАШИЯ КЛИЕНТ ОТ НАЧАЛОТО НА ВЕРИГАТА

warningModal.warningText: We recommend you to wait until the initial installation is done before applying further changes

frontPageSsv.newRegistritionText: Use the newly generated operator key to register a new node operator into the SSV Network
frontPageSsv.insertTitle: insert operator key for existing operator

registerSSV.makeSureText: Please make sure to store and backup your operator secret key in a safe place.Do not share this key with anyone.
registerSSV.copyMessage: Copy your public operator key into this field to confirm that you stored your keys!

serviceModals.localAppText: Open up the service on your local machine
serviceModals.blockRelTxt: Select one or multiple relays to receive blocks from

customInstallation.customInstallationText: This mode is meant for more advanced users and requires you to have a understanding of how the clients interact with each other. You will have to pick and choose, install and connect every part of your node with the UI yourself before it will be functional!
customInstallation.chooseWhereToInstall: CHOOSE WHERE YOU WANT TO INSTALL STEREUM TO

addModifyPanel.syncMessage: SYNCS YOUR CLIENT FROM THE BEGINNING OF THE CHAIN

importSlashingModal.slashModalMessage: Do you want to import with a Slashing Protection Database?

disabledStaking.noValidatorInstalled: There is no validator client installed!
disabledStaking.disabledStakingMessage: Install at least one validator client to activate importing validator keys.

logOutModal.logOutQuestion: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO LOG OUT OF YOUR NODE SERVER?

prunningModal.prunningText: GETH used up storage space GROWs over its operational time. It takes MULTIPLE HOURS to prune the Geth database, removing unnecessary data and freeing up some of the used storage space. This has to be done while Geth is not running. STARTING THE PRUNING PROCESS YOUR NODE WILL GO OFFLINE AND STOP POTENTIAL ATTESTATION DUTIES.
prunningModal.prunningChecked: I READ THE TEXT AND I AM AWARE OF THE CONSEQUENCES

restartModal.restarQ: Are you sure you want to restart?
restartModal.restartMessage: your node might go offline while doing so!
restartModal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want turn your node

nukeModal.nukeQ: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO REMOVE STEREUM & ALL ITS SERVICES FROM THE SERVER?

rpcGuide.clickNav: Click on “CONTROL” to enter the Control Panel.
rpcGuide.toggleMessage: Click on the “ON/OFF” button to open your port
rpcGuide.clickExtention: Click on “your Execution Client” button to copy the RPC URL
rpcGuide.firstMessage: RPC-Endpoint widget located in dashboard. Please turn “ON” the button and click “Execution Client” to proceed to the next step.
rpcGuide.secondMessage: WAIT FOR SYNCHRONISATION You can now send your transaction OVER YOUR NODE WITH METAMASK. When you are done sending you transactions, click on “ON” to close your port
rpcGuide.firstSlide: Now login to your dAPP or wallet you want to use (in our case MetaMask)
rpcGuide.fourthSlide: Type in a name for your network
rpcGuide.fivethSlide: Paste in the copied URL from Stereum
rpcGuide.sixthSlide: Type in the CHAIN-ID your node runs on(for GoerliTestnet it is 5)
rpcGuide.seventhSlide: Type in “ETH” as the currency symbol
rpcGuide.eightthSlide: OPTIONAL - you can paste in a Block Explorer URL
